sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Products.css'; const Clothes = () => { const products = [ { _id: '1', title: 'Nike Shoes 01', src: 'https://i.pinimg.com/originals/ff/d4/cb/ffd4cbee3b78cb17a0c9d41cd9119b71.jpg', description: 'Nike shoes 01', content: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. {products.map((product) => (

{product.title}

{product.price}€

{product.description}

{/* */}
))}
{cart.length === 0 ? (

Aucun produit dans le panier

) : ( cart.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{item.price * item.count}€
{/* */}

{item.description}

{item.content}

{item.count}
removeProduct(item._id)}> X
)) )}
Paiement

Total:{total}€

); }; export default Clothes;
